questions.question: Considering the overall shape and dimensions, what best describes the product's form factor?

What appears to be the texture of the main packaging material?
What color is the most prominent text on the packaging's label?
Based on the visible text, what kind of information is prominently displayed?
Describe the overall color scheme of the background of the product's packaging.
What kind of graphic design elements are visible on the main packaging?

What appears to be the general style of the typeface used on the packaging?

What is the apparent condition of the product's packaging in the image?
Describe the style of the information presented in the rectangular panel on the back.

What is the dominant orientation of the nutritional information presented on the back?
What is the main material used for the product packaging, indicated by its visible characteristics?
